PRCQ·1 | Gideon, Ally of Zendikar | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: [+1]: Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a 5/5 Human Soldier Ally creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.
trans-unit.target: [+1]: Until end of turn, CARDNAME becomes a 5/5 Human Soldier Ally creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.
